name: UpdateSessionRecording2
description:
Update session recording details for a specific project.

This tool updates the details of a session recording for a given project in Datadog. Use it to modify existing recording parameters by specifying the project and recording ID.

parameters.name: session_recording_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the session recording to update.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. To find this ID, use the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: session_recording_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing session recording details to update, such as ID, duration, viewers, activity counts, and timestamps.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
